user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Amazon shopping cart with two items. The search bar at the top displays previous searches, including "LG Ultragear," "MacBook Pro 13 inch," and "Razer BlackWidow." Below, the cart contains a 24" LG UltraGear gaming monitor priced at $199.99 and a MacBook Pro 13 case for $19.80. The user has the option to proceed to checkout, with the ability to add a gift message.
history_actions: click on the Amazon app icon located at the right lower part of the screen.
click on the located at the top.
click on the search suggestion for amazon.com located at the upper left.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the amazon search bar located at the upper part of the screen, and below the amazon icon.
action_plan: Type 'razer nari' in the search bar.
Select the first item in the search results.
Add the selected item to the cart.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Type 'razer nari' in the search bar.
